alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Lonoke; Perry; Prairie; Pulaski; Saline; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 3:11AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Woodruff, southeastern Perry, northwestern Prairie, Lonoke, south central Cleburne, Faulkner, White, central Saline and Pulaski Counties through 400 AM CST... At 311 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rose Bud to near Mayflower to near Williams Junction. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Searcy... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Lonoke... Des Arc... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... Beebe... Ward... Vilonia... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 122 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 127 and 188. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 14. US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Faulkner; Lonoke; Perry; Prairie; Pulaski; Saline; White; Woodruff
